menu_l_global_value_predator_mod: This is a Predator Pack Item!
bm_msk_predator_emissary_desc: Mask of a Deceased Yautjan Soldier.
bm_msk_predator_mr_black_desc: Well there he is, presumably stuck in a middle with you.
bm_msk_predator_kawaii_desc: Who knows for what purpose this mask was made... Pink is cool.
bm_msk_predator_01_desc: Oldest and toughest of the bunch.
bm_msk_predator_03_desc: Great for masking, dagger and cloak action.
bm_msk_predator_06_desc: Mask up if you don't want to become a victim of the sick.
bm_msk_predator_10_desc: The Adventures of the Jungle and Singularity Await.
bm_msk_predator_11_desc: Don't let it out of your sight.
bm_msk_predator_13_desc: They'll crush you like a bug.
bm_msk_predator_14_desc: This isn't your typical urban exploration type.
bm_msk_predator_22_desc: Abandoned by your own kind, there will be a price to pay.
bm_msk_predator_22_extra_desc: Abandoned by your own kind, there will be a price to pay. This one comes out with fully blown dreads of the Yautjan Race. Short term explaination - You look like a Killa!
bm_msk_owfl_gasmask_desc: Hides your identity and lets you live a little longer. Night Vision included.
bm_msk_samurai_predator_desc: The Way of the Samurai is Long and Hard...
